oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Songwriters in the Round - The Songs of Brad Paisley - 2017-02-18
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Songwriters in the round with singer songwriters Ashley Gorley, Kelley Lovelace, and Lee Thomas Miller from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on February 18, 2017. In support of the exhibit Brad Paisley: Diary of a Player.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Ashley Gorley; Kelley Lovelace; Lee Thomas Miller;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Walk-in music / (09:08) Opening comments by Abi Tapia / (09:38) More walk-in music / (11:50) Introductory comments by Abi Tapia and introduction of participants / (17:11) Opening comments from the songwriters / (20:20) High Life (Kelly Lovelace) / (27:27) The World (Lee Thomas Miller) / (33:10) Then (Ashley Gorley) / (40:37) He Didn't Have To Be (Kelly Lovelace) / (48:11) I'm Still A Guy (Lee Thomas Miller) / (54:28) American Saturday Night (Ashley Gorley) / (01:02:31) River Bank (Kelly Lovelace) / (01:08:56) Crushin' It (Lee Thomas Miller) / (01:14:23) Start A Band (Ashley Gorley) / (01:19:02) Wrapped Around (Kelly Lovelace) / (01:26:57) Perfect Storm (Lee Thomas Miller) / (01:32:51) Today (Ashley Gorley) / (01:36:45) Closing comments / (01:41:53) TAPE END
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Gorley, Ashley; Lovelace, Kelley; Miller, Lee Thomas; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
